original_text: So Lot went out and spoke to his sons-in-law, who were pledged to marry his daughters. He said, “Hurry and get out of this place, because the Lord is about to destroy the city!” But his sons-in-law thought he was joking.
korean_text: 롯이 나가서 그 딸들과 결혼할 사위들에게 말하여 이르기를 여호와께서 이 성을 멸하실 터이니 너희는 일어나 이 곳에서 떠나라 하되 그의 사위들은 농담으로 여겼더라

sentences.original_text: who were pledged to marry his daughters
Hurry and get out of this place
because the Lord is about to destroy the city
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 주께서 이 도성을 멸하시려 하기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: But his sons-in-law thought he was joking
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그의 사위들은 그가 농담을 하는 줄 생각했습니다
